summary: Adds a bridge over the river above the Build-Your-Own-Home.
descriptionHtml:
After using the Build-Your-Own-Home mod for a while I found myself constantly trying to swim the fast moving river on the cliff above it to reach the home. I found that annoying, so I jumped into the CK and built a bridge across it. It has two lanterns, one hanging over each side of the bridge so it should be easy to see in the dark.

=Installation=

Download with manager and install, or unzip and drop the data folder contents into your data folder.

=Uninstallation=

Disable with manager, or remove the .esp from your Data Folder.

Build your own home (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18480) is property of supernastypants, and is not required to use this mod. This mod only adds to Skyrim and has no dependencies on anything except Skyrim.esm.
author: Triaxx2
